```{r}
# 2. What was the average age of people who are going out trick or treating and the average age of people 3. not going trick or treating?
distinct(candy_data_all_rows_country_tidy, age)
names(candy_data_all_rows_country_tidy)
candy_data_all_rows_country_tidy %>%
     filter(going_out == "No") %>%
     summarise(mean(age), na.rm = TRUE)
```
